Name: Dimensional Rift
About the game: Dimensional Rift is a Virtual Reality arcade game with intense hand waving. Fight your way through waves of hostile spheres, deadly laser and devastating bombs. Survive for as long as you can and compete on the leaderboards! Four difficulty levels (Easy, Normal, Hard, Insane) Steam Leaderboards Easy to pick up and play right away 100% Free!
Meta Title: Dimensional Rift: Feb 8, 2017, Team Seven and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dimensional Rift? Check out the release date (Feb 8, 2017), developer insights from Team Seven, and a complete game summary.
